original_title: I Do Not Know What It Is I Am Like
overview: "I Do Not Know What It Is that I Am Like" juxtaposes images of animals, both wild and domestic, and natural environments with human activity as it takes place in an apartment, and during a fire walking ceremony in Fiji. Documentary-style footage is combined with staged events. Despite the piece's lack of a traditional narrative, it bears some relationship to nature works.  The segment features material from "Il Corpo Scuro (The dark body)" - animals and natural environments are seen up close and at a distance.
title: I Do Not Know What It Is I Am Like
